ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“We'll secure the route.
You come up later.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“We'll secure the route.
You come up later.”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

ops.raw: a5 00 00 d7 ff bc ff 8b ff 15 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“Y'know…standing here like this…”{PAUSE}“Kinda makes you feel like the
Planet's not really with us, y'know?”{PAUSE}“Of course we can't even compete.
I mean…
The Planet don't even notice us humans…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “…Seein' a place like this,
makes you realize how awesome
nature is.”{PAUSE}“But, if anyone ever told me to live here,
I'd tell them to…well, you know…”{PAUSE}“I tell you one thing though,
If I did have to live here
I'd change things around 'n' make it better.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “I guess Midgar is the total
opposite of this place.”{PAUSE}“When you think of it that way,
the Shinra don't seem so bad…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “What the hell am I sayin'!?
The Shinra, not bad!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“Gotta keep telling myself
this blizzard's okay…brr”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Red XIII}
“I wonder what's at the top of that cliff?
Well we shall see…”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 ff ff e1 fd f7 fe 1a 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cid}
“Damn!
If I was back in the air,
this cliff would be nothing!”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 ff ff e1 fd f7 fe 1a 00
a5 00 00 ff ff e1 fd f7 fe 1a 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Yuffie}
“Brrrr, I can't take this cold!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cait Sith}
“This is secret info, but…
Rufus's going to arrive here, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Vincent}
“I wonder what's on
the other side of that cliff…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “Look we can't go to the cliff!
So just give it up!!”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“We'll secure the route.
You come up later.”

{Barret}
“You know,
I've been thinkin'…”
{CHOICE}What is it?
{CHOICE}Save it for later

“…Seein' a place like this,
makes you realize how awesome
nature is.”{PAUSE}“But, if anyone ever told me to live here,
I'd tell them to…well, you know…”{PAUSE}“I tell you one thing though,
If I did have to live here
I'd change things around 'n' make it better.”

“I guess Midgar is the total
opposite of this place.”{PAUSE}“When you think of it that way,
the Shinra don't seem so bad…”

“What the hell am I sayin'!?
The Shinra, not bad!?”

{Barret}
“Y'know…standing here like this…”{PAUSE}“Kinda makes you feel like the
Planet's not really with us, y'know?”{PAUSE}“Of course we can't even compete.
I mean…
The Planet don't even notice us humans…”

{Tifa}
“Gotta keep telling myself
this blizzard's okay…brr”

{Red XIII}
“I wonder what's at the top of that cliff?
Well we shall see…”

{Cid}
“Damn!
If I was back in the air,
this cliff would be nothing!”

{Vincent}
“I wonder what's on
the other side of that cliff…”

{Cait Sith}
“This is secret info, but…
Rufus's going to arrive here, too.”

“Look we can't go to the cliff!
So just give it up!!”
